TextLibrary.Text: Neehi pays you well for your troubles. You also receive an award: Master Merchant.
You decide to keep this very nice Soultree Axe.
You must travel to Gallia and visit the Dwarven Smith there.
You must return the Soultree Axe to Neehi the merchant in Gruuldok (or, if you are in Gallia, you could keep it).
The Dwarven Smith creates a Soultree Axe for you. You can decide to keep it, or return it to Neehi for your reward.
